snippet.title: PSX Night Striker
snippet.description:
Support Shiryu on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/Shiryu
https://www.facebook.com/ShiryuVideoGames/

Arcade perfect port of obscure and overlooked ace sprite scaling shooter "Night Striker" is an excellent choice for any "Space Harrier" fans out there. Impressive sprite scaling coupled with "Darius" style branching paths ensure that this one is quite an enjoyable pick and play experience, with hardcore players finding quite a challenge if you decide to take on a time attack against the bosses. Enjoy!
